name: Back Channel Deals
effects: You receive the effects of that activation, instead of your opponent.

name: Sabotaged Ordinance
trigger: Your opponent attacks one of your spacecraft.
effects: Do damage to the attacking spacecraft equal to its accuracy.

name: Saturation Bombing Campaign
trigger: You successfully bombard your opponent's asset.
effects: That asset cannot be activated next turn.

name: Crisis of Conscience
trigger: One of your assets switches control to your opponent.
effects: You gain control of one of your opponent's spacecraft.

name: Coordinated Assault
trigger: You successfully bombard your opponent's asset.
effects: Do 1 damage to each megastructure on the asset.

name: Barrage Jamming
trigger: One of your spacecraft occupies an orbital with an enemy spacecraft.
effects: That spacecraft cannot be targeted this turn.

name: Intercepted Orders
trigger: Your opponent moves a spacecraft out of an orbital containing your spacecraft.
effects: You may move your spacecraft to the enemy spacecraft's new position.

name: Retribution Protocol
trigger: One of your assets takes damage.
effects: Deal 1 damage to two different assets.

name: C2 Worm
effects: You gain control of target megastructure for the next round.

name: BGP Isolation Procedures
trigger: A spacecraft moves to one of your assets.
effects: Target spacecraft cannot be activated again this round.
